revision.text: Possibly: An account of an embassy to the court of the teshoo lama in Tibet : containing a narrative of a journey through Bootan and part of Tibet / by Samuel Turner ; to which are added views taken on the spot by Samuel Davis and observations, botanical, mineralogical and medical by Robert Saunders. (London : Printed by W. Bulmer, 1800). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/1006667548
